name: Zariman School Art Display
description: A collection of drawings and paintings by talented Zariman school children.

languages.description: Eine Sammlung von Zeichnungen und Gemälden talentierter Zariman-Schulkinder.

languages.description: Une collection de dessins et de peintures des talentueux écoliers du Zariman.
languages.name: Zariman: Exposition d'art scolaire

languages.description: Una raccolta di disegni e dipinti di talentuosi bambini della scuola Zariman.
languages.name: Display d'Arte Scuola Zariman

languages.description: 재능있는 자리만 학교 아이들의 그림과 회화 모음입니다.
languages.name: 자리만 학교 미술 전시

languages.description: Una colección de dibujos y pinturas de escolares talentosos de la Zariman.
languages.name: Exposición de arte escolar Zariman

languages.description: คอลเลกชันภาพเขียนและภาพวาดของเด็กนักเรียน Zariman ผู้มากความสามารถ

languages.description: Колекція ескізів та малюнків талановитих учнів школи на «Заримені».
